messages.subject: Christian Unschooling Website

messages.messageBody:
Hello, all!

Below is a post that appeared on another list I'm on. Thought some of
ya'll might be interested. Personally, I'm excited that the Christian
community is catching on to unschooling. I say that, in light of how I've
seen some homeschool, and how Christian unschoolers have been criticized by
the Christian homeschool community for so long.

Aaaaaanyhow, I have NOT checked it myself yet, and I know nothing about it.


Diane
--------------------------
From: Emhenry@...



Here is a great new website, devoted to homeschooling, unschooling and God.
(
http://www.geocities.com/Heartland/Pines/8049 ) The main page talks about
an
upcoming book on Christian Unschooling and also offers a monthly e-zine. At
the bottom of the main page are topical links to other pages. They include:
various homeschooling links, unschooling, state resources, special needs,
and
a page called "my pile"....with subject after subject of educational
links!!


Thank you in advance for your time!!!!!!! I welcome any response!

<>< <>< <><
Elissa Henry
<A HREF="http://www.geocities.com/Heartland/Pines/8049/">Christian
Unschooling</A>
<>< <>< <><
